title: Rick and Morty 5x06: Every EASTER EGG & Hidden National Treasure Joke | Turkey Episode BREAKDOWN
author: ScreenCrush
comment: What do you think of this season so far?
That's right boys, we're skipping 4 whole episode breakdowns.
in regards to the name Coop...  A coop is also the name of a pen or building you keep poultry in.
That wasn't two dueling pistols on the pedestal, it was a pistol and a sabre.

To explain the "You have betrayed your people" line near the end...

The last time the Pilgrim Aliens would have been awake, slavery was still an active pillar of the United States. So seeing a Black man as president, working for the very government that enslaved his people looks like a betrayal.
description:
Rick and Morty episode 6 begins as a riff on National Treasure, spirals off into a parody of Gravity Falls, Adaptation, the Wizard of Oz, Terminator, Hurt Locker and American Sniper before arriving at its final moral: Nationalism is a menaingless exercise that only exists to get the powerful paid. 

And that’s just the subtext!

There are also references to Annihilation, Community, and the low points of American history. 

If you're new, Subscribe! →
